item.description:
Join us as we check out Club Caribe- a salsa event organized by Salsa Boston at the Courtyard Marriott, Cambridge. The night includes Latin sampler lessons at 8pm, followed by a beginner salsa lesson at 9pm, then more dancing.

Tickets are a discounted rate of $8 for our group and can be purchased at the door. There is also a $5 charge for each lesson- there is an 8pm Latin Sampler lesson and the 9pm Salsa lesson. So, with the cover charge and 2 hours of lessons, it is $18.

We will meet by the ticket purchasing area. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000. Look forward to seeing you for a fun night!


Beginner Salsa lesson at 9:00.
"Latin Sampler" Lessons at 8pm with MetaMovements
Dancing from 10:00-1am+
Full cash bar
Free Garage & Lot and Free Valet (please don't park at Trader Joe's)
Free hors d'oeuvres
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by the ticket purchasing area. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.name: Salsa Dancing and Lessons, Discounted Tix
